name: Gov. Henry McMaster
tweet: A Summerville native, Sgt. 1st Class Christopher A. Celiz paid the ultimate sacrifice for our country, a debt our nation can never repay. This Medal of Honor recognizes his heroism and bravery. South Carolina, and our country, will never forget his brave sacrifice.

tweet: There is more work to be done but I will always stand up and protect South Carolinian’s Constitutional Rights from unnecessary federal overreach.

name: Gov. Henry McMaster
tweet: This legislation is a way for South Carolina to honor and reward those who served while also attracting veterans with unique skills and experiences to our colleges, universities, and communities.

tweet: Visited @USCAiken this morning for a ceremonial bill signing of S.241. This legislation provides veterans or their dependents using GI Bill education benefits in-state tuition at SC's universities, colleges, and technical colleges regardless of when they left the service.

name: Gov. Henry McMaster
tweet: More South Carolinians are working now than ever before in our state’s history, our unemployment rate is steadily declining, and we’re investing in our people through targeted workforce training.  We’re on a path that will benefit generations of South Carolinians in the future.

name: Gov. Henry McMaster

name: Gov. Henry McMaster
tweet: Additionally, my executive order directs every agency in state government to immediately notify the Office of the Governor and the @SCAttyGenOffice upon receiving any communication or directives from the Biden Admin concerning COVID-19 vaccination requirements.

name: Gov. Henry McMaster
tweet: I have issued Executive Order 2021-38, which prohibits all state agencies in my cabinet from requiring employees to receive the COVID-19 vaccine. The prohibition applies to the 19 state agencies that make up the cabinet.

name: Gov. Henry McMaster
tweet: Today’s announcement will save South Carolina’s businesses millions of dollars, allowing them to reinvest into our state and create even more jobs for our people.

name: Gov. Henry McMaster
tweet: While other states had to take out millions of dollars in loans to cover the cost of unemployment, South Carolina took a fiscally responsible approach that is now paying dividends in lower taxes for our businesses and zero debt to repay.

name: Gov. Henry McMaster
tweet: With this investment of $124 million into our most important resource - our people - we can ensure that South Carolina will have the workforce needed to attract further jobs and investment from companies worldwide.
